person.persName: Charles R. Griffith (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and treasurer )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and treasurer of railroad company. Native of England. Married to Elizabeth Griffith c1850. Father of William Griffith, Cara Griffith, Mary Griffith, Ellen Griffith, Jesse Griffith. Grocer in Louisville in 1850. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Chief clerk of the Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1861. Treasurer of the Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1863. General bookkeeper of passengers and freight and receiving agent for the Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1864.
